Package uno.anahata.asi.chat

Class Chat

java.lang.Object
uno.anahata.asi.model.core.BasicPropertyChangeSource
uno.anahata.asi.chat.Chat
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeSource
public class Chat extends BasicPropertyChangeSource
The central, provider-agnostic orchestrator for a single chat session in the V2 architecture. This class manages the conversation flow, orchestrates calls to the AI provider, and delegates context management to a specialized ContextManager.
Author:
anahata-gemini-pro-2.5

  • Method Details

    • setSelectedModel

      public void setSelectedModel(AbstractModel selectedModel)
      Sets the selected model and fires a property change event.
      Parameters:

    • setStagedUserMessage

      public void setStagedUserMessage(InputUserMessage stagedUserMessage)
      Sets the staged user message and fires a property change event.
      Parameters:
      stagedUserMessage - The new staged message.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(InputUserMessage message)
      The primary entry point for the UI to send a message. This method is designed to be called from a background thread (e.g., a SwingWorker).
      • If the chat is idle, this method will start the processing loop and block the calling thread until the entire conversation turn is complete.
      • If the chat is already busy, it will stage the message for later processing and return immediately. The ongoing loop will pick up the staged message when its current turn is complete.
      Parameters:
      message - The user's message. Can be null or empty to trigger a context resend.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the current chat execution by interrupting the execution thread.

    • chooseCandidate

      public boolean chooseCandidate(@NonNull @NonNull AbstractModelMessage message)
      Adds a chosen model message to the history, handles tool execution, and continues the conversation if necessary.
      Parameters:
      message - The model message to add.
      Returns:
      true if the conversation turn is complete, false if it should continue.

    • processPendingTools

      public void processPendingTools()
      Processes all tool responses associated with the current tool prompt message. Tools with APPROVE_ALWAYS permission are executed, while others are rolled to NOT_EXECUTED.

    • getActiveCandidates

      public List<AbstractModelMessage> getActiveCandidates()
      Gets an unmodifiable view of the active candidates.
      Returns:
      The list of active candidates.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Resets the entire chat session to a clean slate.

    • getAllModels

      public List<AbstractModel> getAllModels()
      Gets a flattened list of all models available from all registered providers.
      Returns:
      A list of all available models.

    • isShutdown

      public boolean isShutdown()
      Checks if the chat session has been shut down.
      Returns:
      True if the chat is shut down, false otherwise.

    • getLastResponse

      public Optional<Response<? extends AbstractModelMessage>> getLastResponse()
      Gets the last response received from the AI model.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the last response, or empty if none exists.

    • getLastTotalTokenCount

      public int getLastTotalTokenCount()
      Gets the total token count from the last response, if available.
      Returns:
      The total token count of the last response, or 0 if no response is available.

    • getContextWindowUsage

      public double getContextWindowUsage()
      Gets the current context window usage as a percentage (0.0 to 1.0).
      Returns:
      The context window usage percentage.

    • getNickname

      public String getNickname()
      Gets a human-readable nickname for the session.
      Returns:
      The session nickname or short ID.

      public void setNickname(String nickname)
      Sets the nickname for the session and fires a property change event.
